title: The Four Steps to the Epiphany EPUB MOBI
description:
Been looking high and low for a digital ebook version of this book, couldn't find it anywhere (because they don't make it in a PDF/Ebook), ended up borrowing a friends Kindle and buying the book from Amazon. Then I realized I can't take highlights and notes so I was like wtf?

I COULD access the books on the Kindle though, and ended up stripping the DRM off it and converting it to an EPUB that I can use with my iBooks. All so that I can use highlights and take notes. Lol

This is a pretty good EPUB version as good as an official one will be, since its converted from a Kindle version NOT a half assed OCR PDF, so enjoy. You can probably convert it to PDF using Calibre if that's your style.

There is a mobi format as well but I haven't tested it. It was created with Calibre fyi.

Cheers
